missionSuccessStatementOverride: Good job. But be ready - second wave of enemies is about to arrive...
badFaithStatementOverride: This was a horrible preformance. Our contract is terminated.
goodFaithStatementOverride: You did your best. But without Alpha Site...I am sorry but the contract is terminated.
shortDescription:
Over the past week, following the destruction of our other sites, an unidentified force has been launching probing attacks on our remaining excavation site, Alpha Site, as well as on our local HQ and distribution center, Zvezda Prime. Alpha Site is now our only remaining active mining operation in the {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} system.

Given the increasing frequency and intensity of these incursions, we anticipate a major assault may be imminent. However, we must also consider the possibility that these attacks are a diversion, designed to draw resources away from Zvezda Prime. Consequently, we have split our defenses between the two sites. Once the pirates commit to an attack, we’ll redeploy all our forces to where they’re needed most.
longDescription: Something is off with this Commander. Pirates pillage, they don't destroy.

objectiveList.title: Ensure the fuel for the turret generator is unloaded safely
objectiveList.description: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.

objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

dialogueContent.words: Commander, the Argo has detected vehicle and 'Mech forces converging just north of your position. They’re only minutes out.

This is it Commander. But I think we've got an ace up our sleeve. Their 'Mechs and vehicles can’t keep up a prolonged assault — their oxygen will run low, forcing them to fall back to their supply vehicles to refill their oxygen tanks.
Most medium or light 'Mechs cannot operatate in vacuum over long time. And I recon these guys have spent few hours marching here...
This means we can expect a brief respite, likely half an hour to an hour after their initial assault, as they'll need to pull back to refill their oxygen supplies.
Good job, people. The pirates are pulling back. I'll inform our employers that Alpha Site is holding. But keep in mind — we haven’t faced their main force yet...

{MC.If.PlayerLances.Speaker.HasTag.pilot_criminal}<color=#85DBF6FF>[Criminal background]</color> A word with you, Commander? Pirates don’t take losses if they can help it. So whoever you’re up against? This ain’t your run-of-the-mill pirate scum..
Yeah, I’m with you on that... Let’s use this downtime to rearm and swap out MechWarriors and ’Mechs if we can, Commander.

Mercenary Command, this is Dingo Team Actual. The APCs are running low on rocket ammo and the fighting in the vacuum fried three out of four of our LL emitters. I'm pulling my team out of the fight; we'll regroup and bolster the infantry defenders at the base.

Roger that, Dingo Actual. Appreciate the assist.

Alright, people, you heard them—time to gear up and brace for round two...
That's unfortunate, Commander. Time to cut our losses.

Mercenary Command, this is Dingo Team Actual speaking - we'll detach the fuel trailers and let the Alpha crew handle refueling the turret generator. My APCs will now join the defense, but don't expect miracles from them.
Heads up, ground team. Sensors are picking up multiple contacts closing in from the east and west. Looks like more pirates...
Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
Damn...There was at least 50 people in that building.
Commander, the enemy is targeting the building housing the base' life support. We lose that one, we lose the fight.

Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, we’re now certain the enemy is fully committed to the assault on Alpha Site. I’m redeploying our security 'Mech lance to reinforce your position. They’re on their way and should arrive at Alpha Site in about two hours.

Commander, if we get solid confirmation that the enemy has committed all their forces at your position, I’ll redeploy our security lance to support you. With a bit of luck, we’ll be able to hit their forces from behind.
One more thing - the earlier probing attacks on Alpha Site have drained the turret generator’s fuel supply.
I've dispatched APCs with fuel trailers to Alpha Site and they should be arriving any moment now.
Escort them safely into the base and we’ll have those automated turrets back online.
Good luck out there, Commander.
